title: What are some books that give us fair knowledge about Indian history? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have answered similar questions on Quora earlier. To know the complete history of India, you need to read more than one book. The following are good reference books for a proper understanding of the subject. India: A History - John Keay.The Wonder That Was India - A L Basham.An Advanced History of India - R C Majumdar.India’s Struggle for Independence - Bipin Chandra.Discovery of India - Jawaharlal Nehru.History of Modern India - Bipin Chandra.India Wins Freedom - M A K Azad.India After Gandhi - Ramachandra Guha.

Here are some books that I can suggest you. India after Gandhi by Ramchandra Guha.India before Gandhi ,by Ramchandra Guha.India from midnight to millenniums, by Shashi Tharoor.India: what can it teach us, by Max MullerIncarnations : A history of India in 50 lives, by Sunil KhilnaniIndia's undending journey, by Mark Tully.
